SEARCH

Package org.myshelfie.network.messages.commandMessages

package org.myshelfie.network.messages.commandMessages
  • Class
    Description
    CommandMessage
    This abstract class is impemented by all the messages sent by the Client to the Server.
    CommandMessageWrapper
    This class wraps the message sent by the client or the server.
    ConnectingStatuses
    Enumeration of possible connecting statuses.
    CreateGameMessage
    This kind of command message is used to create a game.
    HeartBeatMessage
    This is a speccial kind of CommandMessage since it is not linked to any Command class.
    JoinGameMessage
    With this message a Client communicates the will to join the game gameName
    NicknameMessage
    This message is sent by the Client to the server when the client wants to join a game or rejoin after disconnection.
    PickedTilesCommandMessage
    This class represents the command used to send the choice of the tiles picked from the Board.
    RefreshAvailableGamesMessage
    This message is used to request the list of available games from the server, since this list is not sent automatically except from the first time the client connects to the server.
    SelectedColumnMessage
    This class represents the command used to send the choice of the column of the bookshelf in which the user wants to put their tile(s)
    SelectedTileFromHandCommandMessage
    This class represents the command sent to the server to choose which tile the player wants to put in the selected column (amongst the ones present in their hand)
